IOSS Options
Default Setting
The amount of the orders (shipping cost included) will be declared and recipients will be required by the customs to pay VAT when parcels arrive in the destination countries of EU.
Please enter correct and valid IOSS IDs, which should be linked to corresponding destination countries. IOSS ID will not be applied if the destination country is not linked to a correct IOSS ID.
Declaration with your store order amount
The amount of your store orders will be declared if available, otherwise, the amount of the CJ orders (shipping cost included) will be declared, and you will be charged for VAT upon your own IOSS ID. Orders valued above €150 will be declared with your IOSS ID while the recipient will be required to pay tariff and VAT.
Declaration with the CJ order amount (shipping cost included)
The amount of the CJ orders (shipping cost included) will be declared, and you will be charged for VAT upon your own IOSS ID. Orders valued above €150 will be declared with your IOSS ID while the recipient will be required to pay tariff and VAT.
Declaration with your store order amount
The amount of your store orders will be declared if available, otherwise, the amount of the CJ orders (shipping cost included) will be declared, and you will be charged for VAT upon CJ's IOSS ID. CJ's IOSS ID is not applicable to orders valued above €150, and the recipient will be required to pay tariff and VAT.
Declaration with the CJ order amount (shipping cost included)
The amount of the CJ orders (shipping cost included) will be declared, and you will be charged for VAT upon CJ's IOSS ID. CJ's IOSS ID is not applicable to orders valued above €150, and the recipient will be required to pay tariff and VAT.
